entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening and dissipating before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:20 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:20 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
